detail_desc: Set with a short-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with a round neckline, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, low crotch and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Blouse in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the front and ribbing around the armholes, cuffs and hem.
Swimsuit with an all-over print, a frill around the neckline that continues along the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back. Lined at the front.
Cap in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves in mesh.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Slim-fit trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, front pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and embroidered appliqués.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with covered heels and a soft shaft with a zip on the inside. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom at the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine loose knit with slits at the hem and no fasteners. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Polo-neck top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves. Slim Fit.
Faux fur slippers with soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.

Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with an opening front and back, and a pleated stand-up collar with a knot detail at the front. Covered buttons at the back of the neck and short sleeves. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Short skater skirt in soft fabric. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Jersey top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Hole-patterned trims at the neckline and down the front and back.

Knee-length dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with pleats at the top, and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a decorative metal buckle, a concealed zip in one side and a slit at the back.
Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 5 cm.
Leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Long-sleeved tunic in a crêpe weave with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and a rounded hem.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a lace hem. No fasteners.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut, oversized shirt in a softly draping weave with a pointed collar and concealed button band down the front. Low dropped shoulders, extra-long, wide sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. The shirt has a pleat at the back to create volume and soft draping that is concealed by a loose yoke. Slits in the sides.

Checked shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fitted skirt in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist. Slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and broderie anglaise at the hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, asymmetric fastening with a tie belt at the side, open chest pocket and wide cuffs with slits.
Earrings with shell-shaped pendants. Length approx. 4.7 cm.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and an opening with a strap at the back. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey leggings in a sturdy cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in a crinkled cotton weave with embroidery. Round neck with an opening and ties at the top, long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a drawstring seam at the waist and flared skirt with inset lace trims. Lined skirt.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and a fuller cleavage, and ties at the back of the neck.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed style with a slightly lower crotch, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Asymmetric lace top with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and seam at the hem.

Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in stretch jersey with a sheen made from Eastman Naia™ cellulose acetate. Small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and a vertical seam for a draped effect front and back. Lined.
Shorts in a crinkled viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, decorative ties at the front and a small frill trim at the top.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and high-cut legs.
Short, wide T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, printed sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted dress in cotton twill with narrow shoulder straps and a zip at the back. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in woven fabric with an open chest pocket, straps with adjustable buttoning, and buttons at the sides. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y), and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined.
Short, flared skirt in imitation leather with a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in twill with a slight sheen, high paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, a concealed zip at the back and high slits front and back. Unlined.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.

Shirt in soft washed denim with a drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, side pockets, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with an intarsia motif.
3/4-length leggings in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with a fine-knit back. Round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed, asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.
Short yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the front and back and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Straight-cut top in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Fancy dress cape in printed jersey with an appliquéd hood, appliqués at the back, sleeves, and a hook and loop fastening at the top.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
